name: RollerCoaster Tycoon 3 Fireworks Display
summary: An FWD file contains a RollerCoaster Tycoon 3 fireworks display. It specifies the fireworks (and other effects) used in the display, those fireworks' timing, and any music included in the display. RollerCoaster Tycoon 3 includes several default FWD files, and players can create their own FWD files.
